channel.title: Summoning Help - Dementhium 637
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to add summoning into my server and having a little difficulty lol. I followed this guide here perfectly : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=535261.0
and didn't get ANY errors, compiled/restarted server/etc. However when I go to summon an npc from a pouch, NOTHING happens, and in the server CMD Prompt it says : [code]interfaceId=149 buttonId=0 slot=7 itemId=12093 (InventoryListener) Item option not added for Item 12093[/code]
Any idea on what I did wrong?

item.title: Summoning Help - Dementhium 637
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Yes, none of them work >.> tried EVERY single one of them lol

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Well that was the comment i was talking about have you tryed all the pouch’s???

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

I read all the comments already. The only comment that was useful was the one linking to the Inventory Listener file. I already followed that step.

Read full topic
